item.title: Tunneling Internal Services through Cloudflare
item.description: A guide on setting up and managing Cloudflare tunnels to securely expose internal services using practical examples and security measures.

item.title: Securing Windows 11 to DoD Standards
item.description: Learn how to secure Windows 11 to meet Department of Defense standards with this guide. From identifying vulnerabilities to applying fixes, elevate your cybersecurity skills and understanding.

item.title: Building a QR Code Security Analysis Tool
item.description: Exploring the creation of an API to counter “Quishing,” this post highlights the use of advanced tools for analyzing and mitigating threats from malicious QR codes.
